mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as id, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, INTRO, "PROFILE" as img, REGDATE, REGIP, ACTIVATION FROM USERS ORDER BY REGDATE DESC

SELECT u.id, u.name, u.phone, u.email, u.intro, u.img, u.regdate, u.regip, u.activation FROM ( SELECT USER_ID as id, NAME as name, EMAIL as email, PHONE as phone, INTRO as intro, "PROFILE" as img, REGDATE as regdate, REGIP as regip, ACTIVATION as activation, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) as rnum FROM USERS ) as u WHERE u.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ORDER BY u.rnum
SELECT INST_ID as instId, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, "PROFILE" as profile, REGDATE, REGIP as regip, APPROVAL, ACTIVATION FROM INSTRUCTOR ORDER BY REGDATE DESC

SELECT i.instId, i.name, i.email, i.phone, i.profile, i.regdate, i.regip, i.approval, i.activation FROM ( SELECT INST_ID as instId, NAME as name, EMAIL as email, PHONE as phone, "PROFILE" as profile, REGDATE as regdate, REGIP as regip, APPROVAL as approval, ACTIVATION as activation, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) as rnum FROM INSTRUCTOR ) as i WHERE i.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ORDER BY i.rnum
